name: reading-spotlight
description: Chrome extension that helps focus on text with a customizable spotlight overlay

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.build: cp manifest.json dist/ && html-minifier-terser src/popup.html -o dist/popup.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.postbuild: cd dist && zip -r reading-spotlight.zip manifest.json content.js popup.html popup.js icons/
scripts.copy: cp manifest.json src/popup.html dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run copy && concurrently -n ts,static -c blue,green 'npm:watch:ts' 'npm:watch:static'
scripts.test: npm run build && playwright test --grep-invert '手動操作'
scripts.test:headed: npm run build && playwright test --headed --grep-invert '手動操作'
scripts.test:manual: npm run build && playwright test --headed --grep '手動操作'
